description: This file implements functions related to the TLS Module Container Object, including enrollment, manufacturing, and destruction of feature objects. It includes function definitions such as TlsMcoEnrollFeatureObjects, TlsMcoManufactureFeatureObjects, and TlsMcoDestroyFeatureObjects, and handles object lifecycle management within a TLS module.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsMcoEnrollFeatureObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls all internal objects necessary for the TLS module container.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsMcoManufactureFeatureObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Creates and initializes internal objects required by the TLS module container, specifically the environment controller.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsMcoDestroyFeatureObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Cleans up and destroys internal objects used by the TLS module container, particularly removing the environment controller.
